remarks: Define the class of all finite undirected simple graphs without loops. Such a finite graph is an undirected simple graph without loops ` <. V , E >. ` of finite order, i.e. where ` V ` is finite. (Contributed by AV, 3-Jan-2020.)

df-fusg $p |- FinUSGrph = { <. v , e >. | ( e : dom e -1-1-> { x e. ~P v | ( # ` x ) = 2 } /\ v e. Fin ) } $.
